overview:
Richard Scott has helped leading early-stage technology companies such as Vocera Communications and Colubris Networks to develop and execute European market-entry strategies.

He has also developed wireless strategies for blue chips such as UBS Investment Bank where he Chaired their worldwide Wireless Telecoms Committee, and created a mobile services practice group for a NASDAQ-listed consultancy acquired by global IT professional services Ciber plc.

Richard has been a founding board member of various companies which are now publicly listed such as Ventura and DST Innovis International. On behalf of clients, and as principal, Richard has secured customers across the UK and Europe.

A native of Canada, and former resident of California, he has lived in England for over 15 years. Richard speaks fluent French, has an MSc in Technology Management and an MBA from Manchester Business School.
